```{r kmdeathacrasi, fig.cap="1-KM Death All-cause RASi"}
fit <- survfit(Surv(sos_outtime_death, sos_death == "Yes") ~ sos_ddr_rasi,
  data = pop %>% filter(sos_covidconfirmed == "Yes")
)

# logrank
sd <- survdiff(Surv(sos_outtime_death, sos_death == "Yes") ~ sos_ddr_rasi,
  data = pop %>% filter(sos_covidconfirmed == "Yes")
)
p <- dF(pchisq(sd$chisq, length(sd$n) - 1, lower.tail = FALSE), dig = 3, p = TRUE)

# c(bottom, left, top, right)
par(mar = c(6, 6, 1, 1) + 0.1)
# par(mar=c(4, 4, 1, 1) + 0.1)
plot(fit,
  fun = "event",
  ylab = "Death (%)",
  xscale = 1,
  yscale = 100,
  col = global_kicols,
  mark.time = FALSE,
  bty = "n",
  # xmax = 365.25,
  xlim = c(0, 80),
  ylim = c(0, 0.6),
  xlab = "Days",
  axes = F,
  lwd = 3,
  lty = c(1, 2, 3),
  xaxs = "i", yaxs = "i"
)

axis(2, seq(0, 0.6, 0.1), seq(0, 0.6, 0.1) * 100, las = 2)
axis(1, seq(0, 80, 20), seq(0, 80, 20))

m11 <- 1 - summary(fit, 70)$surv
text(60, m11 + c(+.025, -.03), c("No RASi", "RASi"), pos = 4)

text(30, 0.35, paste0("Log-rank p = ", p), pos = 4)

mtext("No. at risk", side = 1, line = 3, at = -12, adj = 0, cex = 1)

mtext("No", side = 1, line = 4, at = -10, adj = 0, cex = 1)
mtext("Yes", side = 1, line = 5, at = -10, adj = 0, cex = 1)

nrisk <- summary(fit, seq(0, 80, 20))$n.risk

axis(1, at = seq(0, 80, 20), labels = nrisk[1:5], line = 3, tick = FALSE, cex.axis = 1)
axis(1, at = seq(0, 80, 20), labels = nrisk[6:10], line = 4, tick = FALSE, cex.axis = 1)
```
